visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly temperature data. Custom colors should be applied to the chart, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a background color and specific margins for better visual appeal. The x-axis represents months with styled labels, and the y-axis represents temperature with a title and styled labels. The data series contains monthly temperature data with a custom color. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme. This configuration ensures a clear and visually appealing representation of the monthly average temperature data.
